required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Time for Lunch: The Impact of Lunch Time Constraints on Child Eating Behaviors
clinical_study.official_title: Time for Lunch: The Impact of Lunch Time Constraints on Child Eating Behaviors

brief_summary.textblock: Recent peer-reviewed observational evidence suggests that school children receive anywhere from 10-33 minutes of seated lunch time and that students with less time to eat discard higher amounts of milk, entr√©e (i.e. protein items), grains, and vegetables. This waste is a missed nutritional and food security opportunity and also negatively impacts the environment. The purpose of this study is to estimate the impact that lunch time constraints have on child food selection, consumption and waste behaviors using a crossover trial design, where lunch periods are randomly allocated to be either 20 minutes or 30 minutes each day.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Ranges from 5 days to 20 days, depending upon how long each participant elects to enroll in the summer camp
primary_outcome.description: The type and number of school meal components selected by students to eat for lunch.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Ranges from 5 days to 20 days, depending upon how long each participant elects to enroll in the summer camp
primary_outcome.description: The weight of each school meal component that was consumed by each child during lunch. Each measured in grams.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Ranges from 5 days to 20 days, depending upon how long each participant elects to enroll in the summer camp
primary_outcome.description: The weight of each school meal component that was discarded by each child during lunch. Each measured in grams.

arm_group.description: The lunch period will last only 20 minutes.
The lunch period will last 30 minutes.

intervention.description: We are randomly allocating a 20 minute or 30 minute lunch period length.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Must be enrolled in local summer camp
Exclusion Criteria:
- None
